title: Ep 10: Zara Rahim
itunes:title: Ep 10: Zara Rahim
itunes:subtitle: Head of Strategic Comms at The Wing and team Obama and Hillary alum Zara Rahim hops into the studio today to talk drugstore lipstick, CVS coupons, and her fool-proof strat to a successful customer service experience every single time. Follo...
description:
Head of Strategic Comms at The Wing and team Obama and Hillary alum Zara Rahim hops into the studio today to talk drugstore lipstick, CVS coupons, and her fool-proof strat to a successful customer service experience every single time. 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Zara and Caroline go over their favorite cheap makeup products and then reveal the $$$ product they haven’t found good dupes for yet. Zara makes a compelling case for lip liner, Caroline talks about the first time she shaved her legs (disastrous), and CANCEL CULTURE comes up a few times, too. You’ll laugh, you’ll cry, etc!


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Maybelline New York Color Matte Lipstick: https://amzn.to/2S5CBhN 
  • Biologique Recherche p50: https://shoprescuespa.com/biologique-recherche-p50.html
  • Algenist GENIUS Liquid Collagen: https://fave.co/2S1fzIX 
  • CVS Extra Care Card: https://fave.co/314YNg4
  • Revlon PhotoReady Finishing Pressed Powder: https://fave.co/37MFVVO 


Why Is Your Skin So Good: Zara Rahim (The Cut)

https://www.thecut.com/article/zara-rahim-skin-care-routine.html


Follow Zara on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zararahim/

And on Twitter (especially ahead of the election!): https://twitter.com/zararahim

Thanks for listening!

Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 


Shop the spreadsheet (updated with new recs all of the time!): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vdIkPMWhV0FlRux3u_DVpuGvakQxkF3EbYT2ZVv45B8/edit#gid=0 and the Amazon store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit


Want to get in touch more formally? Have a rec you want to rec? Shoot me an email! Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
